name: Google Scholar Search
description:
Searches for publications on Google Scholar.
Returns a structured list of academic publications with details like titles, authors, abstracts, and citation counts.

To use it, simply provide a search query. You can optionally narrow the results by specifying a start and end year for your search.

The tool performs a robust search by first attempting to use the scholarly library to retrieve rich metadata. If that fails or returns no results, it automatically falls back to a direct web scraping method to ensure maximum reliability.
The output also indicates which search method was successfully used.
author: @@official.shinkai

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (applies to both methods). Default: 10

timeout.description: Timeout (seconds) for HTTP requests in fallback. Default: 30

user_agent.description: User-Agent header for web scraping fallback (can be overridden).

year_low.description: Optional lower bound year for search (inclusive). Used only when scholarly search method successful.

query.description: Query string to search (used by Scholarly and scraping).

year_high.description: Optional upper bound year for search (inclusive). Used only when scholarly search method successful.

instructions_to_show_results.description: LLM-facing instructions on how to show the search results to the user.
instructions_to_show_results.name: instructions_to_show_results

items.description: A unified publication record with normalized fields from scholarly or scraping.
items.name: result_item

snippet.description: Short snippet or abstract of the publication.
snippet.name: snippet

scholarly_error.description: Error message from attempting the scholarly library method, if any.
scholarly_error.name: scholarly_error

scraping_error.description: Error message from the scraping fallback, if any.
scraping_error.name: scraping_error

search_method_used.description: Which method was used to obtain results: 'scholarly library' or 'web scraping'.
search_method_used.name: search_method_used
